entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
